items.title: Nanexa and Moderna Announce PharmaShell Technology Partnership
items.rewritten_summary: Nanexa AB announces strategic partnership with Moderna to develop PharmaShell technology for extended-release injectable formulations.

items.title: UZEDY (aripiprazole) Extended-Release Injectable Shows Positive Phase 3 Results
items.rewritten_summary: Teva Pharmaceutical announces positive Phase 3 clinical trial results for UZEDY, a novel extended-release injectable formulation.

items.title: MedinCell Receives 2.5M Grant for Malaria Prevention LAI Development
items.rewritten_summary: MedinCell secures 2.5 million grant to advance development of long-acting injectable malaria prevention treatment using BEPO technology.
